com.smarthome.emulator.simulations

Class DetailedSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.DetailedSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class DetailedSimulation
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Creates environment for server detailed testing. Provides detailed creation, setting and managing of adapters and their sensors. Also provides possibility to save and load adapters, print adapter's logs and others.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • showSavePrintDialog

        public void showSavePrintDialog()
        Show dialog with options to save and print logs of currently active adapter panel, save all creates adapter panels or cancel dialog. If "Save and print current" action is selected, save and print dialogs are shown. If "Save all adapters" action is selected, save dialog is shown.

      • printLogs

        public void printLogs()
        Merges all logs of currently active panel into one document and after confirming print dialog prints this document.

      • isAdapterIdFree

        public boolean isAdapterIdFree(java.lang.String id)
        Checks if id given as parameter exist in adapters list
        Parameters:
        id - id to be checked
        Returns:
        true if id is free to take, false otherwise

      • incrementSensorsCount

        public static void incrementSensorsCount()
        Increase number of sensors

      • decrementSensorsCount

        public static void decrementSensorsCount()
        Decrease number of sensors

      • loadAdapterFromXML

        public void loadAdapterFromXML()
        Opens load dialog. From given XML file loads adapter information and it's sensors properties sets, which are used to add new adapter panel and all other needed components to simulation.

        Shows errors:

        • ADAPTER_ID_TAKEN if loaded adapter id already exists
        • LOAD_DOC_CREATE if cannot create document from given file
        • LOAD_DOC_READ if cannot read given file
        • LOAD_DOC_PARSE if cannot parse given file
        • FILE_NOT_FOUND if given file was not found

      • saveAdapterToXML

        public void saveAdapterToXML(Adapter adapter)
        Opens save dialog. Offers saving of one or all adapters. To given file saves adapter's and it's sensors information needed for later loading of this adapter.
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter to be saved, null if safe all adapters in simulation

        Shows errors:

        • SAVE_DOC_CREATE if cannot create document for given file

      • adapterToXML

        private void adapterToXML(Adapter adapter,
                org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                org.w3c.dom.Element rootElement)
        Inserts information from adapter to doc in XML format attaching adapter's element to rootElement. If rootElement is null, makes adapter's element doc's root element.
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter with information to be saved, not null
        doc - document to save XML elements to, not null
        rootElement - element to attach adapter's element to, possible null

      • saveSensorsToXML

        private void saveSensorsToXML(Adapter adapter,
                    org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                    org.w3c.dom.Element rootElement)
        Inserts information from adapter's sensor list to doc in XML format attaching sensor's element to rootElement.
        Parameters:
        adapter - adapter with sensors list to be saved, not null
        doc - document to save XML elements to,not null
        rootElement - element to attach sensors element to,not null

      • saveSensorValursToXML

        private void saveSensorValursToXML(Sensor sensor,
                         org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                         org.w3c.dom.Element rootElement)
        Inserts information about sensor's values to doc in XML format attaching values element to given rootElement.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor with values to be saved, not null
        doc - document to save XML elements to
        rootElement - element to attach values element to, not null

      • showDialog

        public java.lang.String showDialog(java.lang.String title,
                          boolean save)
        Show either save of load dialog returning file name of file to be saved/loaded.
        Parameters:
        title - dialog title
        save - true for save dialog, false for load dialog
        Returns:
        file name on success, null if no file selected
